name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Java Developer with 8 years of experience in building high-performance applications within diverse sectors, including healthcare and finance. Expertise in **Java**, **Spring Boot**, **Spring Framework**, **Spring Data JPA**, **Hibernate**, and **PostgreSQL**, ensuring robust backend development and efficient database management. Proficient in CI/CD practices that enhance deployment reliability and speed, leveraging **Liquibase** for database version control and **Gradle** for project automation.

In my past roles, I have led the development of enterprise-grade platforms, implementing AI solutions for predictive analytics and intelligent automation. I have a solid background in microservices architecture and event-driven systems, combined with hands-on experience in integrating **AI** capabilities. I am adept at using project management tools like **Jira** to streamline development processes and enhance team collaboration. My strong foundation in cloud services positions me as a strategic contributor capable of delivering compliant and secure applications.
